text: @brooklynmutt This is why they are pushing for states to reopen even thought it's not safe to do so. So an excuse to keep people from being able to vote by mail in the face of COVID-19 risks. Most people are not standing in line for cupcakes. Such corrution and cruelty! Let them eat cupcakes?
